data.name: Four color jumps - 扩展包
data.detailed_description:
Introduction to game playing methods
Players need to move the small ball in the operation screen through the left and right keys to make the small ball rise, pass through or contact the springboard and jump up constantly.
In addition to the default white, the springboard has four colors. Each time you pass an obstacle, you will change the color. When you encounter the springboard with the same color as the ball, the jump range will be higher than usual~
Gold coins settled after passing the level can unlock skin and other rewards!

Operation guide
A, D or ←→ key to control the movement of the small ball

About DLC
This DLC contains 12 girl animations. When you finish the game, you can activate the animation. DLC contains adult nudity.

data.short_description: Four color jumps is a leisure jumping game. The ball rises, crosses or touches the springboard, and constantly jumps up. Let's see where the limit of the ball is!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
